name: pepperminty-wiki
tagline: A lightweight single file wiki engine
description: Pepperminty Wiki is a single-file wiki engine written in PHP designed for easy self-hosting. It supports Markdown content, version control, and customizable themes in a lightweight package.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write wiki pages in Markdown with syntax highlighting and live preview for easy content creation

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Full-text search across all wiki pages to quickly find information regardless of page structure

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize wiki appearance with customizable CSS themes and layout options

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Attach images and files to wiki pages for embedded media and downloadable resources

features.title: User Management
features.description: Optional authentication system with user accounts and permissions for controlled editing access

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource requirements make it suitable for shared hosting or low-power servers
